name: TimeJam (DillyzThe1)
description:
Welcome to TimeJam, a game made by DillyzThe1 and Impostor5875 where you must collect the lost archaic crystals, altering the timeline until it's how it should be. Each one of these crystals have some unique property that gets restored every time it's put into the machine, causing a reset that may unlock an ability or reveal paths inside of a stage.

This game currently only has a tutorial, as this is a demo made from 2/7-2/12 for the Haxe 2023 Winter Jam.

Want to play around with the source code? It's right here!

CONTROLS:

  • Use the arrow keys to move. (WASD will be available starting from v0.6.0)
  • Use space or up to jump.
  • Hit enter to move through dialogue, thought holding shift skips all dialogue.
  • Hold down to phase through semisolids.

Programming by DillyzThe1 & Impostor5875.

All animation was made mostly by DillyzThe1.
All music and most sounds were made by DillyzThe1.
Other sounds were made by Impostor5875.

No other help was brought on yet.
